moves.1... Nf6 2. Nc3 e6 3. Nf3 Bb4 4. Qc2 Nc6: Idea to castling on Queen side
moves.8... O-O 9. O-O-O Kh8 10. h4 Qd7 11. Ne5: Placing Knight on e5 means I need Nc6

moves.16. h5: Very beautiful move, later it opens Rook
moves.16... Kxh7 17. hxg6+ Kg7: Black king can't escape by moving Kg8 instead of Kg7
